website_summaries.verdict: A multitasking, fogless mirror that also makes for a great gift.
pros: A true treat for anyone who's shaved in a sink
Designed for shaving, with handy parts that hold both a shaving can and razor
We love the stainless steel features that make the product look expensive despite its price

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Thought Design
customer_reviews.text: The mirror and suction cups function very well, and the build quality is fine. However, the design just isn't functional as it's envisioned. The metal prongs shown to be a razor holder slant downward and do not have a lip. This does not securely hold your razor (it falls constantly). Eventually I just took pliers to the thing and fixed it myself by adding a lip in the metal. My other complaint is the upper rack. It's designed to hold one standard sized shaving cream can, but realistically that's not a typical use case. Why is it designed in a way where it can't also hold soap or different shaped shaving cream containers?
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I would skip this if I had it to do over
customer_reviews.text: It's bulky and heavy and even with four large suction cups it didn't hold on for more than week. The shaving cream holder works, but the razor holder will only hold the cheap narrow throw away razors. Any kind of razor with a replaceable blade won't hang on this. The mirror is distorted, kind of looks like a fun house mirror. And there is a film that develops on it. I image this is some kind of anti fog coating. But instead of fogging, this coating kind of turns into a gel on the mirror surface. After the mirror fell off, I didn't bother to put it back up.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had this mirror for about a month and something happened that I do not understand. It looks like it is peeling. The reflection is very odd. The mirror surface has a very rough surface to it now. It cannot be cleaned. It fogs horrible. And you cannot see any details at all in the reflection. I would not recommend this mirror to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: texnixon

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy. Not only is this mirror NOT fog free, the mirror has a weird curve that distorts the reflection. Horrible product and will definitely be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The mirror has great clarity even with hot shower. It only took seconds to install. It's somewhat flat, which is preferred to keep a low profile in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It if wasn't for this product I wouldn't be shaving every day - so I love it. I would however admit it took me a while to figure how to stick it to my shower wall so that it doesn't fall off. It does get a little foggy but it's not a big deal. Watch it when you hold it your hands, the back edges of the frame metal could be sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Suction Cups
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good mirror. Unfortunately, the suctions cups are horrible and all but 1 have turned inside out and will not work. My options have been to have it hang with just the one (making it a diamond shape instead of square/rectangle which is weird when shaving) or I have had to use a separate suction hook to hold in place. It is not fogless per se, but a bit of soap on the mirror keeps it clear.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY BOTTOM BRACKETS AT THE WRONG ANGLE AS TO HOLD RAZOR STORAGE UNDERNEATH MIRROR PROPERLY....
customer_reviews.text: BRACKER UNDERNEATH FOR RAZOR STORAGE IS NOT BENT AT THE CORRECT ANGLE IN ORDER TO HOLD THE RAZORS PROPERLY IF AT ALL. THE MIRROR ITSELF SEEMS TO BE ADAQUATE, TO REPEAT THEY NEED TO HAVE BENT THE 2 PIECES OF METAL ON THE BOTTOM ON EITHER SIDE IN ORDER TO HAVE THIS PRODUCT BE ABLE TO FUNCTION PROPERLY LIKE I BELIEVE IT WAS INTENDED TO. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again or recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Mirror fell out of the frame on Day 1. Constant battle to keep the mirror in the frame. Mirror is carnival in nature. Reflection is not true, seems to be looking through funhouse glasses when trying to shave. Would not buy again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W.

customer_reviews.title: Mirror fogs up in shower.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for two weeks and the mirror fogged up every time. I tried all the home remedies I could find for this, but it still fogged. It got too annoying and I took it down two weeks after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: no fog but little grip
customer_reviews.text: delivered without one of the four suction cups (even though the suction cups are screwed on) but decided to keep the product anyway. I have put nothing on it to weigh it down and it still will not hold itself up. Adding the fourth suction would not matter as they lose their grip on the flat, clear glass side of the shower. However, it does stay up for 24ish hours and the mirror does not fog.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.G.

customer_reviews.title: He loves this one and claims it is much better engineered for holding razors and shave cream than his ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to replace his junky Sharper Image one that fell apart. He loves this one and claims it is much better engineered for holding razors and shave cream than his old ones. He also claims no fogging on the mirror. It has been suctioned cupped to the shower wall since I bought it for him 11/14 and never has popped loose or fell off..he is tickled with it... and he is picky about everything
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is warped and distorts the image - it's made of thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: The "mirror"is made of thin plastic - not glass. I don't think it would stand up to many cleanings. This mirror is not flat and thus distorts the image. The steel frame and section cups seem fine. I returned it, but now, a month later, I received an email from Amazon saying that they did not receive it. I discarded the postal the slip some time ago. I replied to Amazon's email but it bounced back as undeliverable !!
customer_reviews.author: Q. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Crummy
customer_reviews.text: Crummy. Used it first time it was great. Second shower I took the coating was coming off the mirror. Started sliding down the wall wouldn't hold. Mirror has since become unglued from the frame. Search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun House Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a mirror, first and foremost, and this one should be in a Fun House. The image is very distorted, the only way to shave is to get so close your nose practically touches the mirror, then the distortion is minimized. The same company builds a smaller one that is round, it has a much better image. I bought one of those and put this one in the guest bath. It's worth a laugh at least.
customer_reviews.author: bmathews

customer_reviews.title: you end up having to put water on the mirror to keep it un-fogged while trying to shave and still find a place to put your tooth
customer_reviews.text: The mirror fogs up within about five minutes of turning the shower on. The razor hanging attachment does not hold a razor as it is bent to much to hold it in place. Basically, you end up having to put water on the mirror to keep it un-fogged while trying to shave and still find a place to put your toothpaste and toothbrush as well as they do not stay in the slotted area easily either. What started as a great idea for my husband who now loves to shave in the shower, has turned into a disappointing surprise Christmas present for him! I would not recommend purchasing this product again to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney B.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better ones
customer_reviews.text: First, people should realize that no "fog-free" mirror stays fog free for very long. That said, this mirror performs well in comparison to many (and I do mean many) that I've used before. It has lost most of the fog-free aspect after 4 months of use - I keep a small Oxo squeegee suction cupped next to the mirror. By the way, the aluminum frame is substantial and weighty, as are the suction cups. This may be alot of what contributes to the relatively high the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Gom. Addams

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my hubby and it works great! No more clogged bathroom sink. Yay! However, my Venus razor keeps falling off of the holder (Hubby's is fine). Hasn't fogged up once. Has unplanned benefit of helping me get off all of that stubborn makeup at the end of the day and washing off all the mascara (no more Zombie eyes!)
customer_reviews.author: Evk

customer_reviews.title: this thing will cut you
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 4 months now and this thing is dangerous. the edges of the curved steel lip that comes out at the bottom (that holds razors, etc) are very sharp. I bumped into it in the shower about 3 months ago and cut the back of my thumb on it. I chalked it up to a fluke and then today, I bumped into it again with the back of my elbow and now have a nice slice on the back of my elbow. The fog free mirror works for the most part except when I turn it on really hot. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Just keep browsing
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is fine, but the way they shrink-wrapped it deformed the suction cups, so they don't stick. I need an anti-fog mirror that stays attached to my shower wall. So, if it doesn't stay attached, I cannot see my perty face. That equals a total fail. Keep browsing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this mirror and having two holders for his and her razors is the many reason we purchased it. I find that the razors stay out of the water line and dry (no rusting) as opposed to leaving them on a shelf which invariably gets wet. My husband enjoys shaving in the shower so it's been a win/win for both. We spend less money on razors too.
customer_reviews.author: Kossie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. I have yet to find a mirror that will not get all steamed up in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: D Downs

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: It's true that the mirror is fogless in the shower, but it's also true that the mirror appears second hand from a carnival. I cannot say I know much about mirrors, but this one distorts the image of anything it reflects. Looking at it is uncomfortable like if you were to look through someone else's glasses. Different parts of anyone's face in the mirror are distorted, stretched, or magnified. This is now on my list of one of the worst 2 or 3 things I've purchased on Amazon. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bradly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. It stays stuck onto your mirror even after weeks of movement caused by the shaving cream. It doesn't fog up after a 15-20 minute hot shower, although the mirror does get moist. Not to the point to where you can't see your reflection.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousReviewer0309

customer_reviews.title: No fog!!!

customer_reviews.title: We like this item but the only thing is that the ...

customer_reviews.title: good for the price

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good suction.

Holds a standard can of shaving cream and hanger for two razors - Gillette Mach 3 fits nicely. No fog on mirror! Great product.

customer_reviews.title: No idea how it got this many good reviews. Maybe I got a defect

customer_reviews.title: This item is complete junk!
customer_reviews.text: Totally unsatisfied! This item does not stay supported on the shower wall. It falls off and on floor repetitively. It also rusted within days of having the item in the bathroom. The seller totally misrepresented this item and I will never buy anything from them again!

customer_reviews.title: Not So Fogless

As a less important critique, the picture shows a razor hanging from the bottom which is really impossible for anything other than maybe a very basic 2- or 3-blade razor with no head rotation. Anything more advanced will not fit, and I doubt even the simple razor would be held there due to the angle of the tray.

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror, Works very well to prevent condensation and stays very clear!

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror for the shower

The best thing is that it really holds on tight. I had a couple before that would fall after a few days or something. Great for what I need. A mirror to shave in the shower and can hold the shaving cream and the shaver.

customer_reviews.title: Not fog free
customer_reviews.text: This says it's an anti-fog mirror but it constantly fogs up and the metal holder, is alright but since I have a tight shower area it is sharp and will cut you.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Good value, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good value, gets the job done. It only fogs if you don't take the protective plastic sheet off of the mirror (which it tells you to do on the packaging). It only works on a smooth surface (which it tells you in the product details). It doesn't hold bigger razors, but you can rest it horizontally. Holds smaller shaving cream cans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but not fog free
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I like shaving in the shower. It was easy to install and attaches nicely to tile. However, it does fog up. I have to take the shower wand spray water on it to free it of fog and warm it up. Even after that it is still not very clear and it fogs back up. I am thinking of applying another product to it in an effort to improve the fogless aspect. I've heard of using shaving cream and Rain X also has a product. It is convenient and has freed up some space by having my shaving cream tube and razors in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Mirror on the shower wall
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd purchase after it lost its fog free coating after a number of years. Bought it again because I like the shaving cream and razor holder. Suction cups work great on acrylic shower stall. Fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KCJP

customer_reviews.title: well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Four suction cups ensures it doesn't fall even under the weight of a soap bar and wet washcloths. Compared to similar products, this one has a wide "shelf" for either shaving cream or soap which is great. It seems really well constructed with metal (not silver coated plastic). And it doesn't fog. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Solano

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work as advertised. I have a new tile shower and mounted the mirror on brand new smooth tile as instructed, it stayed up for about 10 minutes and fell. I have tried quite a few more times without success, once it fell after we were in be and scared the hell out of us. I have resorted to holding the mirror with one hand and shaving with the other. The mirror does fog up when placed near the shower spray. Extremely disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: its anit-fog for the 1st shower. After that it ...

Holds a can of cream plus two razors and the suction cup holding brackets actually hold the product onto a nice, clean wall !!

customer_reviews.title: not so hot, fog free mirror

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shower mirror
customer_reviews.text: I like how it has the holding area for my razor and gel. The mirror is a bit distorted, but it does stay fog free and does the trick. Great addition to my shower. I would recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: The fog proof film wore off quickly. It is still a functioning mirror that I just wash the fog off of when I need to shave. That can be annoying but it's not unworkable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought few shower mirror and they kept falling off my glass shower but this one so far so good and it doesn't fall and its very secure and most importantly No Fog I highly recommend this shower mirror.

customer_reviews.text: Very well made and stays secure on the shower wall. The mirror is a great size. I only give it 4 stars because my razor is not the right shape to stay on the razor hanger.

product_meta.title: iDesign Forma Suction Bathroom or Shower Shaving Mirror with Shaving Cream and Razor Holder - Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Suction MirrorThe iDesign Forma Shower Shaving Mirror provides modern functionality for your bathroom. This rectangular mirror adheres to any nonporous surface so you can stick it on your bathroom mirror or the wall of your shower. It features four strong suction cups, a curved shelf, and two hooks to store razors, loofahs, shaving cream, soap, and more. The brushed stainless steel construction is a classic style that matches any decor. This compact mirror is great for use in small spaces. Measuring 6.25" x 2.5" x 11", the iDesign Forma Shower Shaving Mirror will make shaving in the shower easy and fun! 

With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.

Features a curved shelf and two hooks for holding razors, loofahs, washcloths, shaving cream, soap, and more. Perfect for use on your shower wall, bath wall, bathroom mirror, or anywhere else a small mirror is needed
FUNCTIONAL: Features 4 super strong suction cups that adhere to any nonporous surface including glass, tile, and fiberglass
DURABLE: Made of rust-resistant stainless steel for years of quality use
STYLISH: Attractive brushed finish is perfect for any bathroom decor
IDEAL SIZE: Measuring 6.25" x 2.5" x 11", this compact mirror is the perfect addition to your bathroom
